idps.title: databox.me
idps.description: Databox.me is the first Solid-compliant, public and free service on which you can get a WebID and data storage (limited).

idps.title: RWW.IO
idps.description: RWW.IO is a read/write Linked Data service that is free (and open-source) for personal use. It offers WebID accounts and 100MB of limited storage.
